title: Seminars and Workshops
description: Get hands-on training in competitive programming, AI, ML, web and software development, UI/UX design, and more.

title: Problem Solving Sessions
description: Join weekly problem solving sessions to strengthen analytical thinking, logical reasoning, and core mathematical skills.

title: Programming Contests and Hackathons
description: Participate in IUPCs, ICPCs, intra college programming contests, hackathons, project showcases, IT quiz contests, etc.

title: Tech Talks
description: Engage with alumni and mentors, and discuss trending technologies and career insights with fellow members and tech professionals.

title: Industry Visits
description: Explore IT firms and startups to interact with industry experts and gain valuable real-world knowledge and career exposure.

title: Projects and Research
description: Bring your ideas to life by working on innovative projects or research under guidance from mentors and senior peers.

title: Tech Blogs and Magazines
description: Publish your technical articles, project highlights, or research findings to share knowledge and insights with a wider audience.

title: Social Activities
description: Promote digital literacy through IT awareness campaigns and train rural students in basic computing and introductory programming skills.
